body:
A better way to test a *state change* is to use the `expect { … }.to change { … }` RSpec macro.

Example:

```ruby
expect { User::AvailabilitySwitcher.reset }
  .to change { coach_available.reload }
  .from(true).to(false)
end
```

You don't need the `before` block that way.
